alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 25 at 6:10AM CDT until April 26 at 11:24AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Glover River At Glover affecting McCurtain County. For the Glover River...including Glover...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Glover River At Glover. * WHEN...From this morning to late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Minor to moderate flooding will take place on the Glover River west of Glover, Oklahoma and especially at its confluence with the Little River west of Golden, Oklahoma. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 615 AM CDT.
